Description.OtherFeatures: Avon acts self-serving but in reality, when it comes to actions, he is more selfless than any of the others, constantly saving the lives of almost everyone he comes across and including the entire crew several times over, with nothing to gain for himself.

CustomWeap.Name: Prec LS Hilt 1 by KERR
CustomWeap.Description:
[H3]Precision Lightsaber Hilt[h3]
Precision Lightsaber Hilt 1 by KERR

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Disguised[b]: Add [SE] to checks to identify the lightsaber as such when it is not ignited.
[B]Personalized Design[b]: When the lightsaber's creator makes a successful Lightsaber check, an automatic [SU] is added.  All others add automatic [TH].
[B]Personalized Inlay[b]: Reduce the difficulty of checks to modify any crystal installed in this lightsaber by 1.
Force-sensitive characters using Force powers to sense their surroundings automatically detect a lightsaber using a mephite crystal if it is within the range of the power.

CustomGear.Name: Espionage Droid
CustomGear.Description:
[H3]Espionage Droid[h3]Droid is the size of a ping pong ball and a flyer, it is unusally small (benefit bought) and hard to notice due to being covered in camoflage paint.
The shape of the droid is a non-descript pattern shell such that multiple units can combine into a shape that enhances their ability to either look like something innocuous or just be less noticable.

Mod.MiscDesc: Vehicle can operate underwater without penalty.

ItemDescInfo.MiscDesc: Vehicle can operate underwater without penalty.

Mod.MiscDesc: Buoy may be jettisoned as an action.
Buoy can be programmed with a specific transponder code with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Buoy can be set to transmit a distress signal or other data.
A character operating ship sensors must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to identify that the buoy is not an actual ship.
After being jettisoned, buoy no longer counts as being attached to the ship until it is reattached.
Add [SE] to Computers checks to identify the buoy
